I try to use Player to control a robot in gazebo with a command line:player *.cfg, and get the result:
error   : Failed to load plugin libgazebo_player.
error   : libtool reports error: file not found
error   : plugin search path: /usr/local/lib:/home/szb/PlayerStageGazebo/myExample:.:/usr/local/lib/
error   : failed to load plugin: libgazebo_player
error   : failed to parse config file gazebo.cfg driver blocks

I edit the .bashrc as follows:

export PATH="$PATH:/usr/local/lib:/usr/local/bin"
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/lib
export STAGEPATH=/usr/local/lib
export PLAYERPATH=/usr/local/lib
export PKG_CONFIG_PATH=/usr/local/lib/pkgconfig
source /usr/share/gazebo/setup.sh
source /usr/share/gazebo-1.8/setup.sh

but it doesn't work, can you give me some advice? Thanks.
